author: Special Correspondent
text: The voluntary study circle at the district employment office here will conduct free coaching classes for those appearing for the Group IV examination to be conducted by the Tamil Nadu Public Service Commission in October to fill up 4,931 vacancies of Junior Assistant, Typist and Stenographer. According to a press release from K. Haribaskar, District Employment Officer, the classes will be conducted between 10 a.m. and 5 p.m. from March 8 on Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Saturday and Sunday. Those desirous of attending the classes should be present at the District Employment Office at 10 a.m. on March 8.
title: Free coaching
